name: callmehD's TD2
description:
a tower defense about ancient fragments roaming through the forest

INSTRUCTIONS:

click the flag twice before playing. this game has alot of bugs, like all shitty scratch games do

this game was made on scratch because... why the hell not?

make it to wave 20 to finish the game... and when you do, tell your mother i said hi

try to get the secret kill sound... you wont
